TITLE: Welcome to
SHORT-DESCRIPTION: Aragosta Hotel & Restaurant is located in Durres, right next to a private beach. Rooms are modernly furnished and air-conditioned, while some offer a view of the sea. The hotel also features a restaurant and wine bar with a sun terrace. Free WiFi and parking are also available.
RESTAURANT.LABEL: VIEW MORE
CONFERENCE.TITLE: CONFERENCE ROOM
CONFERENCE.DESCRIPTION: A conference or meeting room is also available, as well as audio and video equipment. Laundry and ironing service can be arranged. The private beach is fitted with parasols and sun loungers
CONFERENCE.LABEL: LEARN MORE
